CrowJSP5js Powered GUI Framework

A lightweight GUI framework for ...

Get Started
API Reference

Structured Frame System

Organize UI using ScrollFrame and GridFrame layouts instead of manual coordinate management.

Built-in Event Handling

Automatic mouse, focus, and interaction management without boilerplate.

Designed for p5.js

Works naturally with the p5.js draw loop and rendering lifecycle.

Lightweight & Extensible

Minimal overhead with the ability to build custom components easily.

Build P5.js Native UI in Minutes ‚Äã

js
import { Root } from "./Core/Root.js";
import { Button } from "./UIComponents/Button.js";

/** @type {Root} */
let root;
let clickTimes = 0;

function setup(){
  root = new Root();

  const button = new Button(0, 0, 200, 100, "Click Me! üê¶‚Äç‚¨õ", {
    cornerRadius: 20,
    backgroundColor: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)",
    textColor: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)"
  });

  button.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
    clickTimes += 1
    event.target.setText(`You clicked ${clickTimes} times!`)
  });

  root.add(button);
};

function draw(){
  root.show();
  root.mouseEnterEventListeners(mouseX, mouseY);
};

window.mouseClicked = function(){ 
  root.mouseClickedEventListeners(mouseX, mouseY);
};
